channel.title: 508 action buttons
channel.description: Anyone know where to find the 508 action buttons at? Like a list or something so that i know what the action button of each thing is. I've looked around the packets and actionbutton.java and stuff and i can't find it. I'm just starting to come along 508's so don't assume I should know as much as anyone else on these things.

item.title: 508 action buttons
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

It’s alright I’m taking a guess it should be in the actionbutton class.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 action buttons
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:2, topic:235769”]Just use a simple output. Surely there should be a switch statement in one of them classes.

Find the default case and add

System.out.println("action button: " + Action Button Variable);

Note:
Replace Action Button Variable with the variable that holds the action button id, most likely an integer[/quote]K thanks, ill look for it.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 action buttons
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Just use a simple output. Surely there should be a switch statement in one of them classes.

Find the default case and add

System.out.println("action button: " + [b]Action Button Variable[/b]);

Note:
Replace Action Button Variable with the variable that holds the action button id, most likely an integer

Read full topic
